Disclaimer NOTES – Please read very carefully and understand each and every paragraph all the disclaimer notes. (So there is NO Misunderstanding). If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately contact the sender by reply email and delete the original message and destroy all copies thereof: You should NOT copy or use it, nor disclose it for any purpose. Legal, or defects in the legal title and related product and banking financial instruments/products, or intercepted, corrupted, lost, destroyed, arrive late or incomplete, or in defects in design, construction, materials used or structural movements. Or Banks/Lenders/BG/SBLC/L/Cs Providers, banks, insurance fees & change internal policy, compliance regulations and procedures or change in the endowment policy, financial or mortgage protection policy. Ree & Partners: (Independent International Banking & Financial Consultant, Entrepreneur/Deal-maker) Is Not Liable For Any Damages Or Losses. The information given is believed to be correct as at the date it was prepared but its accuracy is not guaranteed. Ree & Partners: (Independent International Banking & Financial Consultant, Entrepreneur Deal-maker) Cannot therefore offer any guarantee of their completeness or accuracy, and accordingly shall not be liable for any loss, damage, cost, expenses or other claims for compensation arising from inaccuracies or omissions therein. Subject to Contract. Please do your own full due diligence before proceeding with any banking & financial deal. Please read very carefully and understand. Any information contained in this email/article, or its attachments is for Information Purposes ONLY and does not constitute an offer of contract nor infer any obligation to supply goods or services without prior written consent/permission. Internet communications are not secure and therefore Ree & Partners: (Independent International Banking & Financial Consultant, Entrepreneur/Deal-maker) Does not accept legal responsibility for the contents of this message. If any verification is required, please request a hard copy version.

Any interested parties are advised to satisfy themselves as to the accuracy on any information they have receive by carrying out independent assessments or otherwise before making any commitment to participate. Property investment anywhere in the world involves risks and many factors such as interest rates and local levels of tourism may affect valuations. The value of your property may go down as well as up. Ree & Partners: (Independent International Banking & Financial Consultant, Entrepreneur/Deal-maker) Have NO control over the Banks, Lenders BG/SBLC/L/Cs Providers, Banks or financial institutions that arrange lending and terms and conditions can change at any time.  Ree & Partners: (Independent International Banking & Financial Consultant, Entrepreneur/Deal-maker) Cannot be held responsible for any such fees and changes. The Contents Of This Email Are A General Guide ONLY, based on our banking & financial solid practical working experiences, strong understanding in-depth knowledge professional education & opinions. And Therefore, recipients are Strongly advised to take legal advice and legal opinion from their, Professional Advisors, Business, Banking & Financial Consultants, Barristers, Corporate Lawyers, Solicitors, Chartered Accountants or Mortgage Advisors and Financial Advisors. Before proceeding with any BG/SBLC/L/Cs or banking & financial deal, projects finance, property purchase or investment decisions. NO Part of This Email or It’s Contents is Intended to Provide Tax, Banking & Financial or Legal Advice and ANY Statements Referring to These Areas Are to Be Considered as General Guide and Opinion ONLY. Legal advice & legal experts’ opinion and full Legal Consultations; Means, Legal opinion vs. Legal Advice. It points to the key difference between a legal opinion and legal advice—i.e., that a legal opinion is an attorney’s analysis based on past or present facts, while legal advice is an attorney’s counsel and guidance as to what future actions the client/customers should take. Please take complete legal advice and legal opinion from your legal experts/barristers/corporate lawyers/solicitors. This information’s is NOT to be construed as an offer to sell or solicit. IT IS EDUCATIONAL IN NATURE AND INTENDED FOR A CLOSED AUDIENCE. The Ree & Partners, is not a Securities Dealer, or Broker or Investments advisers but is a (Independent International Banking & Financial Consultant, Entrepreneur/Deal-maker) Who makes no warranties or representations to the Buyer, Seller, or as to the transaction as due diligence is the responsibility of the Principals. This electronic message (EM) is not to be considered a solicitation nor an offer to sell or buy securities. Any financial estimate, presentation, or financial projection presented herein are non-binding exemplary estimates since only. Principals are authorized to make actual presentations and project financial performance. This information therefore does not constitute advice within the terms of the Financial Services Act (or any subsequent revisions or amendments). Any information contained in this email, or its attachments is for Information Purposes Only. and this information is not to be construed as an offer to sell or solicit. It is educational in nature and intended for a closed audience. Or please do your own full complete due diligence before proceeding with any banking & financial deal. or as to the transaction as due diligence is the complete full responsibility of the principals.
